pageContext.claim: “I will say that never has there been a president -- with few exceptions; in the case of FDR, he had a major depression to handle -- who's passed more legislation, who's done more things than what we've done, between the executive orders and the job-killing regulations that have been terminated.”
pageContext.analysis: We once gave Trump Four Pinocchios for claiming no administration had ever accomplished as much in the first 90 days, since Franklin D. Roosevelt outclassed Trump in just about every respect. Here, Trump offered a nod to FDR. But he still falls short when major legislation is considered. Unlike Barack Obama, who signed the stimulus bill in his first 30 days in office, Trump still has no major legislation passed on his watch.
